Projects.raxSummary: Having the opportunity to create the core architecture and develop the front end of 'rax', a mobile application that adapts the Airbnb model to fashion, simplifying the way we borrow and lend clothing.Having the opportunity to create the core architecture and develop the front end of 'rax', a mobile application that adapts the Airbnb model to fashion, simplifying the way we borrow and lend clothing.Having the opportunity to create the core architecture and develop the front end of 'rax', a mobile application that adapts the Airbnb model to fashion, simplifying the way we borrow and lend clothing.
